summary: Let the Dovahkin handle the dragons. You've got things to do.
descriptionHtml:
Although I have made mods in the past, this is my first time posting a mod on nexus. I have seen requests for a mod like this but I have not found one. 
<br />
<br />The idea of this mod is to add to the roleplaying of the game in that it adds a NPC dovahkin character to the game. Currently he does not do much but I intend on adding features and eventually having him wander skyrim slaying dragons, fighting bandits, and eventually completing the main quest while you do other non-dovahkin things. 
<br />
<br />These mods aren't required but they will help the experience greatly: (If you don't use them there will be 2 dovahkins and that is just wierd)
<br />
<br />[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9557/?]Alternate start - Live Another Life[/url] by: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/684492/?]Arthmoor[/url]
<br />
<br />[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9048/?]You are not the Dragonborn[/url] by: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/164068/?]frodone[/url]
<br />
<br />THIS MOD IS STILL A WORK IN PROGRESS...PLEASE BE PATIENT.
<br />
<br />Feel free to give me suggestions or critiques.
<br />
<br />Twitter:
<br />@Skr3b
<br />
author: Skr3b
